programme.title: The Fifth Cord
programme.desc: Police seem powerless to halt a mass murderer's campaign of madness and mayhem.

programme.title: Torso
programme.desc: A hooded killer with a hacksaw stalks college coeds (Suzy Kendall, Tina Aumont).

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: Bloody Bites is a compilation of snack-sized horror films that will terrorize, astonish, disturb, and excite genre fans across the globe; featuring "The Power of the Strike".

programme.title: The Fifth Cord
programme.desc: Police seem powerless to halt a mass murderer's campaign of madness and mayhem.

programme.title: The Bird With the Crystal Plumage
programme.desc: An American writer (Tony Musante) hunts for an elusive slasher after witnessing an attempted murder through the glass doors of a Rome art gallery.

programme.title: Road Games
programme.desc: An Australian trucker (Stacy Keach) picks up a hitchhiking heiress (Jamie Lee Curtis) and the trail of a killer in a green van.

programme.title: Hollywood Dreams & Nightmares: The Robert Englund Story
programme.desc: Classically trained actor Robert Englund becomes a horror icon with his portrayal of Freddy Krueger, the burned, razor-clawed boogeyman in the "Nightmare on Elm Street" franchise.

programme.title: Goodbye & Amen
programme.desc: An agent's plot to overthrow an African nation is jeopardized by his friend's interference in the country's politics.

programme.title: The Wild Geese
programme.desc: Mercenaries (Richard Burton, Roger Moore, Richard Harris) for a London banker parachute into Africa to put a useful president back in power.

programme.title: Street Trash
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, a ragtag group of misfits must fight for survival when government officials in Cape Town, South Africa, start using a sinister chemical agent to exterminate the homeless population.

programme.title: The Switchblade Sisters
programme.desc: The leader (Robbie Lee) of an all-girl gang feels threatened by a tough new member (Joanne Nail).

programme.title: Sword of Desperation
programme.desc: Released from solitary confinement, a swordsman (Etsushi Toyokawa) must now become his lord's bodyguard.
